from a where 1=1
and title like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{pd.title}),'%')
and smalltext like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{pd.smalltext}),'%')
and newstext like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{pd.newstext}),'%')
